metadata.title: CVE-2023-26605 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel 6.0.8, there is a use-after-free ininode_cgwb_move_to_attached in fs/fs-writeback.c, related to__list_del_entry_valid.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
